sqlMap.insert: insert into artist (artist_id,artist_name,artist_enter, artist_type, artist_debut, artist_country, artist_like) values(artist_seq.nextval, #artist_name#, #artist_enter#, #artist_type#, to_date(#artist_debut#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #artist_country#, #artist_like#)
sqlMap.update: update artist set artist_name = #artist_name#,artist_enter = #artist_enter#, artist_like = #artist_like#, artist_type = #artist_type#, artist_debut = to_date(#artist_debut#,'YYYY-MM-DD'), artist_country = #artist_country# where artist_id = #artist_id#
sqlMap.select: select artist_id,artist_name,artist_enter, artist_type, to_char(artist_debut, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as artist_debut, artist_country, artist_like from artist where artist_id = #artist_id# or artist_name = #artist_name#
